answerText: : animism[10] Animism is discussed at length in this 1871 book, which defines culture as a "complex whole" and introduces the theory of survivals, which are outdated cultural artifacts.
heading: QUARK |2012 | 1 | 9 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer some questions about a certain belief, for 10 points each. [10] This term, reintroduced in an 1871 book, refers to the belief that all natural objects, not just humans or animals, have souls.
